attributes.action: look at the increased cost of electrical goods in the uk compared to the rest of the world
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
the sony playstation 3 hits the uk on 23 march 2007.
but once again the british public are paying more than any one else.
IS THIS FAIR...............
JAPAN    aprox £270
america  aprox £306
europe   aprox £402
UK       price £425 

some £155 more than japan

reasons: Outside the remit of the Prime Minister and Government
